name: Corrupted Universe Cries Quietly
description:
Corrupted Universe Cries Quietly is a roguelike survival game that focuses on combat and exploration.

We were inspired by the game "Muck" to make a game and this was the result.

Explore the world to gather resources and use them to make tools, armour and consumables.

Attempt challenges to gain relics that provide a wide range of effects - the harder the challenge, the better the reward.

Prepare yourself against waves of enemies at night by gearing up.

The game was designed to be better enjoyed with more people, so grab some friends and play.

It's Free and Short, try the game!
